nodes.text: Ragoon VI, or Ragoon-6, was a beautiful planet in the Core Worlds untouched by civilization and therefore pollution. Ragoon gave off a blue glow from space and was surrounded by several stars.

The indigenous Ragoons gave the planet's administration over to the Galactic Senate with the help of the Senator of Aaeton. People from Aaeton and Jedi were the only offworlders allowed on the exotic wilderness planet.[source?] The planet was mostly covered by mountains, and had a very large quantity of mountain flowers of every color. It was also known for ferocious animals called malia.
A younger Qui-Gon Jinn went to Ragoon VI with his friend Tahl.

Years later, just after the Stark Hyperspace War, Jinn and his padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi were accompanied to Ragoon VI by Master Tholme's padawan, Quinlan Vos, to complete a survival-training mission. The boys—nearly drowned by a vortex of churning waters—were rescued by Jinn, who called upon the Force to lift them from the whirlpool.

In 27 BBY, Jedi pilot Wren Honoran took Kenobi and his padawan Anakin Skywalker to the planet for a tracking exercise (since their last mission to Radnor, Kenobi had grown a beard). Here they met the brother-and-sister bounty hunter team Floria and Dane. Four other bounty hunters were there also—Teleq, Mol Arcasite, Hunti Pereg, and an unknown hunter. It was here that Kenobi and Skywalker first met Void in the Force Granta Omega, with whom they would tangle in the years to come.
The Jedi duo would, years later, meet Floria and Dane on the world of Null, posing as bodyguards for the leader of Delaluna, Samish Kash, with whom Floria would fall in love.
